DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Advanced , refractory solid malignancy histologically proven Measurable disease ECOG performance status 0 , 1 2 Adequate bone marrow reserve evidence Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) = 1,500/microL ; Platelet count = 100,000/microL Adequate renal hepatic function evidence serum creatinine = 1.5 mg/dL ; Serum total bilirubin = 2.0 mg/dL ; Alkaline phosphatase = 3X ULN reference lab ( = 5 ULN reference lab subject know hepatic metastasis ) ; SGOT/SGPT = 3X ULN reference lab ( = 5 ULN reference lab subject know hepatic metastasis ) Symptomatic central nervous system ( CNS ) metastases Any autoimmune disorder Positive HIV , hepatitis B hepatitis C antibody test Any allogeneic transplant Congestive heart failure Affected inguinal lymph node ( metastatic process ) lack inguinal lymph node ( resection )
